CSS Basic User Interface Test: Compute kind of widget: border-bottom-color disables nativ id="container"> <style> </style><input id="radio-input" type="radio"><input id="radio-input" type="radio"><input id="radio-input" type="radio"><input id="radio-input" type="radio"><input id="radio-input" type="radio"> </div> <link><script> // Set author-level CSS that matches UA style, but don't use the 'revert' value. const elements = document.querySelectorAll('#container > *'); const prop = "border-bottom-color"; for (const el of elements) { el.style.setProperty(prop, getComputedStyle(el).getPropertyValue(prop)); } </script>
